main.name: Zhansaya Sarmanova
main.description: Full-Stack Web Developer living in Austin, TX. Highly skilled set development in the Software Development field. Learn more about me and check out some of the cool things I have been working on down below.
main.bio: Proven software engineer with a proven ability to lead, strategize, adapt, collaborate, and deliver under strict and tight time constraints.  As a skilled leader, oversaw the development of the Bandmats GraphQL backend in a team of 3 through the course of 1 week by applying problem-solving strategies when designing the database.  As a skilled communicator, collaborated with a team of 2 frontend engineers and 2 backend engineers to design and build a full-stack application in 1 week.  I am now eager to tackle more complex challenges and create innovative ways to build robust, user-friendly solutions for real-world problems.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to send me a message.

resume.skillmessage: There are some of the languages and tools, I have been using lately.

education.school: The University of Texas at Austin,
education.description: Learned industry best practices for practical software development standards with a focus on HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Express.js, Node.js, MySQL, React, MongoDB, GraphQL and algorithms and data structures. Built and deployed full-stack web applications while learning new languages and frameworks by collaborating 40+ hours a week with senior software engineers. Confidently delivered clear and engaging presentations to audiences.

work.title: Instructor
work.description: Led demonstrations and delivered instruction regarding logic gates, object-oriented programming and computer science fundamentals in Python and JavaScript. Mentored 5-15 students on project assignments by hosting office hours twice a week. Collaborated with 6 instructors and the Education Manager to prepare content, materials, discuss student progress, and plan future curriculum.

work.title: Document Control Specialist
work.description: Collaborated directly with QA/QC inspectors to resolve issues and coordinate the correction of errors. Responsible for reviewing, digitizing mechanical documents, and checklists. Uploaded 100 weekly inspection reports to the control sites system, tracked transmittals, and completed revisions as needed.

projects.title: Code Quiz
projects.description: A timed quiz on random Formula 1 facts that stores the top 3 high scores in local storage..

projects.title: Pickfilx & Gril
projects.description: A movie and recipe generator that takes in input from the user.

projects.title: Band Mates
projects.description: A virtual social space for musicians to meet other musicians based on needs, preferences and a love for music!

projects.title: Sous Chef
projects.description: A web application that allows a user to browse a recipe library and save recipes to their own user homepage/dashboard.

projects.title: Workout Tracker

projects.title: Weather-Dashboard
projects.description: Weather Dashboard using Open Weather API runs in the browser and features dynamically.

projects.title: Node Taker
projects.description: This note taking application allows you to save notes with a title and plain text.

projects.title: Online/Offline Budget Trackers
projects.description: Budget Tracker application allows a user to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without a connection.
